title: Still screwed out of promos
body:
So last night I got into a series to go from b3 to b2. Lost the first game, won the other two.
After the second game, it told me I qualified for series again, but did not promote me to b2. 
Just sitting at 100LP after the three games, in series again?

Someone told me to wait a few hours in my last post. That was about 9pm, and now it's 9am the next day and nothing has changed.
I would really like help understanding this. I am a support main so it's hard enough to climb as it is.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but it looks like you had a queue dodge during your series.  :(  A [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) will count as a loss, and with another loss resulted in ending the series.  It looks like you were able to get into another series, though!  Good luck!

My client lagged out during that one, but cool. Guess I'll try for the 4th time. {{item:3070}} 
Thanks for looking into it at least
